Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:            Rees
   
  I can hear those pretty well. On the do you have a message for me one I hear reply as "yes please""phones ringing"

  company name? hehehe
   
  If you can make those mp3 we would appreciate it (if you want to leave some posted). Mp3 takes up about 1/10th the space the wavs do and we dont have alot of space for group posts. We use esnips for larger file storage. Its 50 gigabytes free and easy to permanently share.
   
  http://www.esnips.com/user/MistyDawn  you can add me as a friend if ya join. =)
   
  Misty
